message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob!
I think a 60/40 split is fairer, given I'm taking on the risk of inflation in the next round. Let's see if you agree!
Meet me in the middle, Bob! Let's make a deal!
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think a 55/45 split is a fair reflection of the risks we're both taking. Let's end this now and avoid further inflation.
Let's call it a draw, Bob. I'll meet you exactly in the middle this time!
